title: OCS RULING
body: Why does every player have to be 16 in OCS? Seems stupid to limit our high elo player base even more with this rule.. Should bring back the rule of only needing 3 players to be 16 and the other 2 not needing to be. Limiting talent isn't what OCE needs, we need to show as much talent as we can.

replies.body:
Because if you're under 16 you're a minor (I believe) and OCS is the place where contracts and such become a normal thing so it's not a good idea for Riot to lower the restriction or change it. 

Idrc honestly but I assume that's what it is.
